name: dynamax-cannon
effect: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user’s side of the field.
short_effect: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user unleashes a strong beam from its core. This move deals twice the damage if the target is Dynamaxed.
